title: Spinach and Mushroom Omelette
description: A delicious and protein-packed omelette with spinach and mushrooms.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add onions and cook until softened.
Add mushrooms and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs and pour over the vegetables.
Cook until the eggs are set, then fold the omelette in half and serve.

title: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: A light and refreshing grilled chicken salad with mixed greens and vegetables.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill chicken breast until cooked through, about 6-7 minutes per side.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, tomato, cucumber, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and lemon juice.
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to combine.
Slice grilled chicken and place on top of the salad. Serve immediately.

title: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
description: A hearty and nutritious quinoa salad with black beans, avocado, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Let cool.
In a large bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, avocado, tomato, and cilantro.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and olive oil.
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately.

title: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
description: A simple and delicious baked salmon dish with asparagus and lemon.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and squeeze lemon over top.
Roast for 12-15 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through.
Serve immediately with extra lemon slices on the side.

title: Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts
description: A quick and easy breakfast or snack with Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and nuts.
instructions: Place Greek yogurt in a bowl.
Top with mixed berries and almonds.
Drizzle with honey and serve       immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry with Tofu
description: A colourful and nutrient-packed stir fry with tofu and a variety of vegetables.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Add vegetables and stir fry for a few minutes until tender.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another minute. Serve immediately.

title: Shrimp and Vegetable Skewers
description: Delicious and healthy grilled shrimp and vegetable skewers with a light lemon marinade.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Thread shrimp and vegetables onto skewers.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, and garlic.
Brush skewers with marinade and grill for 2-3 minutes per side, or until shrimp is pink and vegetables are tender.

title: Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
description: A refreshing and nutrient-dense smoothie bowl with blueberries, banana, and chia seeds.
instructions: In a blender, combine blueberries, banana, almond milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with chia seeds. Serve immediately.

title: Zucchini Noodles with Tomato Sauce
description: A low-carb pasta alternative with zucchini noodles and a flavorful tomato sauce.
instructions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add tomato sauce and cook for a few minutes until heated through.
Add zucchini noodles and toss to combine.
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve immediately.

title: Roasted Sweet Potato and Chickpea Salad
description: A hearty and filling salad with roasted sweet potatoes, chickpeas, and a tangy lemon dressing.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400째F (200째C).
Dice sweet potato and spread on a baking sheet. Roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, roasted sweet potato, and chickpeas.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice and olive oil.
Drizzle dressing over salad and toss to combine. Serve immediately.
